attributes.action: Pontypridd to build a skatepark in Ynysangharad Park
attributes.background: Every other unpopular town/place has a skatepark. But us riders have to spend so much money just to get to these skateparks that are miles away.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise this with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
